item.title: Banking in the Wild
item.dc:creator: @four_twenty four twenty
item.description:
@four_twenty wrote:

[quote=“Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS, post:7, topic:319052”]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bank")) { if (isInWilderness == false) { openUpBank(); } else if (isInWilderness == true) { sM("You cannot use this command in the wilderness."); } }[/quote]

i think your code works, but it needs to be worded differently because of how the boolean is.

	public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
	if(isinsafewild()) return true;
		if (Type == 1) {
			if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
					&& (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548) {
				return true;
			}
		} else if (Type == 2) {
			if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
					&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
				return true;
			}
		}
		return false;
	}

so i think it still bank in the wild because the isinwild type isn’t specified. so maybe this code will work.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bank")) { if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) == false) { openUpBank(); } else if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) == true) { sM("You cannot use this command in the wilderness."); } }

the (absX, absY, 1) part could be stopping it? ima give it a shot.

OMFG. IT WORKED. im proud that i figured that out lmao.

Read full topic

item.title: Banking in the Wild
item.dc:creator: @four_twenty four twenty
item.description:
@four_twenty wrote:

I think you had me mistaken. i don’t want it to be admin only, i just want to stop banking in the wilderness. i i tweaked the code. but it still lets you bank in the wild.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“bank”)) {
if (playerRights >= 0) {
if (isInWilderness == false) {
openUpBank();
} else if (isInWilderness == true) {
sM(“You cannot use this command in the wilderness.”);
}
} else if (playerRights < 0) {
sM(“You Bank.”);
} else {
sM(“You must be not in the wilderness to use this command.”);
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Banking in the Wild
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bank")) { if (playerRights >= 2) { if (isInWilderness == false) { openUpBank(); } else if (isInWilderness == true) { sendMessage("You cannot use this command in the wilderness."); } } else if (playerRights < 2) { sendMessage("You must be an administrator to use this command."); } else { sendMessage("You must be an administrator and not in the wilderness to use this command."); } }

item.title: Banking in the Wild
item.dc:creator: @four_twenty four twenty
item.description:
@four_twenty wrote:

alright so i changed my bank code from

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“bank”) && playerRights >= 0) {
openUpBank();
}

to

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“bank”) && playerRights >= 0 && (isInWilderness = false)) {
openUpBank();
}

and now i can’t bank anywhere. even at home. So how do i change it to stop banking in JUST the wild?

Read full topic
